basics.name: Christian Reasoner
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

highlights: Learn about ROS systems and creating packages/nodes
Utilize and learn KiCad in order to create PCBâ€™s
Assist with assembly of submersible systems and learn about mechanical designs of said systems

Under Dr. Thomas Huang and Dr. Aaron Ohta, our team has been working on an application (developed with TKinter) that utilizes a neural network to calculate the size of an embryo based on video segmentations
Worked with a team in debugging/testing/improving the application
Implemented two new features that allow users to alter embryo data
Organized events and activities for children
Develop plans of actions to help enforce acceptable behavior and responsibilities

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Awarded to students that earn a GPA of at least 3.5 for that semester.
